content.description: Dr. Keith conducted a study to investigate whether caffeine improves focus and attention. He selected a random sample of students from his college class and then randomly assigned each of them to drink a cup of coffee or a cup of water before class. At the end of class, he administered a test on their knowledge of class material presented that day.
content.question: Which of the following is the operational definition of the dependent variable?

choices.label: Test scores on the class material

content.answer: Test scores on the class material

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
